entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected PGO schema divergence in a method that's both instrumented and optimized #85799
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshalling.NativeMarshalling on interfaces #85797
  • ComInterfaceGenerator generates cleanup stage for stateless marshalled parameters when it shouldn't #85795
  • System.Text.Json #85793
  • X64 - Too many methods JITted on startup for blank console application #85791
  • Local linux builds should not enable PGO by default #85785
  • Test Failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_84693/Runtime_84693/Runtime_84693.dll #2 #85782
  • [browser] Enable symbolicator on blazor builds #85779
    8.0.0
  • [browser] do native build when preserving native symbols #85778
    8.0.0
  • Segfault in CMiniMdTemplate<CMiniMdRW>::getSignatureOfMemberRef #85777
  • [browser] Cache identity per query string #85775
    8.0.0
  • [WASM] Blazor Application crashes after 15 minutes #85774
    8.0.0
  • Test failure ConsoleEncoding.TestEncoding #85772
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - blazor run tests failing #85769
    8.0.0
  • How to accept a client certificate signed by an untrusted CA in .netcore 3.1 #85767
  • JIT: Invalid ldp optimization with locals #85765
  • Task.Delay consumes lot of CPU #85762
  • Regression: Internal error in ILCompiler #85760
  • .NET 6 Environment.OSVersion returns compatibility mode version #85758
  • [NETSDKE2E] [Regression]With .Net 8 Preview4, 'GC heap initialization failed with error 0x8007000E' on Linux Arm32 #85757
  • SPMI: Give specific context examples for tpdiff #85755
    Future
  • Test failure System.Net.Mail.Tests.LoggingTest.EventSource_EventsRaisedAsExpected #85754
  • SPMI: Native Linux-hosted throughput runs #85749
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/jit64/opt/cse/HugeArray1/HugeArray1.cmd #85747

Closed

  • Regressions in System.Memory.ReadOnlySpan.IndexOfString #85756
  • Convert To 'LibraryImport' with 'W' suffix creates invalid code #85578
    8.0.0
  • "You must download or install .NET" task dialog repeatedly doubles in size on 200% DPI systems #85571
    8.0.0
  • "Cross Platform Cryptography" article is out of date #80122
    8.0.0
  • The HttpClient hangs with GetProxyForUrl #75873
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIfNegativeOrGreaterThanOrEqual #82930
  • Make dependency on lld optional during runtime build #84934
  • [NativeAOT] Optimize the access pattern to threadstatics. #84373
  • High base memory usage with .NET 7 #75049
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Mail.Tests.SmtpClientTest.SendMailAsync_CanBeCanceled_CancellationToken #85751
  • Test failure System.Net.Mail.Tests.MailMessageTest.SendMailMessageTest #85752
  • Test failure System.Net.Mail.Tests.SmtpClientTest.TestGssapiAuthentication #85753
  • Assertion failed '!"SSA check failures"' during 'Build SSA representation' #85629
    8.0.0
  • Missing overrides in LoggingHttpMessageHandler and LoggingScopeHttpMessageHandler #85104
    Future
  • iOS/tvOS simulators ran out of trampolines of type 1 #85582
    8.0.0
  • Double precision seems wired when I try to call ToString("F19") for number with less then 19 digit #85700
  • [API Proposal]: Change `System.Numerics.IPowerFunctions` #85707
  • TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById is slow on Linux when input is Windows TimeZone ID #85432
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2174100 #85802
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add IPC commands to enable and disable PerfMaps/JitDumps #85801
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix RVA field access in composite Crossgen2 build (#78723) #85800
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Add mono hot reload support for updating parameter name #85796
    area-EnC-mono
  • [browser] prevent <DebuggerSupport> from disabling interp optimizations #85792
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix first arg offset computation for unoptimized newobj #85787
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] [browser] fix job queue timespan calculation #85784
    Servicing-consider, needs-area-label
  • Share ILCompiler logic #85783
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - Centralize peephole optimization for removing redundant `mov` instructions #85780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • PipeReader.CopyToAsync(Stream) should not perform zero-length writes #85768
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • [browser] Wasm SDK task tests #85764
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Unify boot config location #85763
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • The AllocationTick threshold is computed by a Poisson process with a 100 KB mean. #85750
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Skip FP registers processing if method don't have floating points use #85744
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve the performance of the type loader through various tweaks #85743
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Merged

  • Remove a number of unneeded nullability suppressions. #85788
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Update path in the WBT README #85794
    area-Build-mono
  • Convert ComWrappers/API tests to XUnit-style #85790
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Don't add duplicate suffix in LibraryImport code fix. #85668
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Revert "SetThreadDpiAwareness for host error dialog" #85773
    area-Host, 8.0.0
  • Avoid using two-char search in IndexOfOrdinalIgnoreCase for 1-char values #85781
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Make WindowsServiceLifetime gracefully stop #85656
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting, 7.0.7
  • [release/6.0-staging] Make WindowsServiceLifetime gracefully stop #85661
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting, 6.0.18
  • [wasm] WBT: Disable blazor test due to https://github.com/dotnet/runt… #85786
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Simplifying access to thread static variables #84566
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Keep `this` alive across the native call for VTable-based source-generation #85723
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Add GenericTypeParameterBuilder implementation and save a generic type into assembly. #85658
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Make dependency on lld optional #85667
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #85748
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono][wasm] Make experimental-gshared-mrgctx really true on WASM AOT. #85770
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: properly scrub SSA from return address buffers #85746
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add mcs support for new FROZEN_ALLOC_ALLOWED jit flag #85745
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Allow forward sub to reorder trees throwing the same single exception #85647
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Missing overrides in LoggingHttpMessageHandler and LoggingScopeHttpMessageHandler #85143
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Annotate IHtmlString.ToHtmlString's return as nullable #85742
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][tests] Increase number of nrgctx trampolines to 50000 #85759
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add negative test for creating instances of function pointers #85709
    area-System.Reflection
  • JIT: Refactor physical promotion in preparation of generalized assignment decomposition #85728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable more ILLink tests in NativeAOT #85651
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Expose various floating-point intrinsics for Avx512F and Avx512DQ #85716
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • Revert "[NativeAOT] Do not strip exported symbols from executables on Apple platforms (#85293)" #85601
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix TimeZoneInfo Perf #85615
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Fix GetNonGCHeapBounds #85702
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • [RISC-V][GC] Use 128gb for regions_range on RISCV64 #84797
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector256.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Interface inheritance follow up #85117
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add request metrics to System.Net.Http #85447
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix GCStress timeouts in JIT/jit64 #85040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Templatize `enregisterLocalVars` in various methods of LSRA #85144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create a createdump static library for single-file dump generation #84864
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #83854
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Suppress clang-16 warnings (backport #81573) #84443
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • The ConstructorBuilder and MethodBuilder generated parameter should not have default value by default #84550
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Run NativeAot tests on arm64 #82307
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove references to P/Invokes and DllImport from resource strings in ComInterfaceGenerator #85178
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Clean up dead code in illink targets #85741
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Move `ASG` rationalization to just after global morph #85494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Servicing docs improvements #85731
    documentation, area-Infrastructure, needs-author-action
  • Use Roslyn Source Generator Testing SDK to test interop source generators #84867
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, source-generator
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Rework JIT<->EE communication for struct promotion; add support for general recursive struct promotion #85569
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Release/6.0] Port EventCounters multi session support to 6.0 #84680
    Servicing-approved, breaking-change, area-Tracing-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 6.0.18
  • Add Ubuntu 22.10 kinetic kudu RIDs for .NET 7 #84984
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add Ubuntu 22.10 kinetic kudu RIDs for .NET 6 #84983
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [release/6.0] Fix HTTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #85341
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, needs-author-action, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Port perfmap environment variable change to 7.0 #85072
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.7
  • [release/7.0] Fix HTTP/3 and HTTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #85337
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, needs-author-action, 7.0.x
  • [Release/7.0] Port EventCounters multi session support to 7.0 #84679
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.7
  • [release/7.0-staging] Add linker flags to add fixup data to PDBs (#58417) #84358
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Zip.Unix: don't hang when creating zip file from directory with named pipe. #85301
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Upgrade System.Reflection.Metadata version #85738
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Avoid reporting frozen segments in GetGenerationBounds #85727
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix invalid "double.ToString" behavior with two section separators #85565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [draft][browser] loader #85730
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [wasm] PackedSimd, add floating point methods #85705
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Generalize assignment decomposition in physical promotion #85323
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] Enabling AOT wrappers for virtual delegates #85643
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [browser] Load appsettings to VFS #85520
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Attempt to devirtualize call if we have type information about `this` #85528
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Mono][RISC-V] emit mul inst instead of emulated mul #85445
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [MONO] Add JIT_CODE_DEBUG_INFO record functionality for Jitdump #85107
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Fix - Do not remove `CAST` nodes on assignment if the `LCL_VAR` is a parameter. #85734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - use the new sdk with templates #85498
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` indexing #85254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [JIT]: Inline TLS field access for GC type #85619
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth and PreferredVectorBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • This fixes an issue with gradual decommit in scenarios where we have … #84975
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Address `TODO-FIELD`s and delete quirks #85735
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Implements the CodeGen::genCodeForIncSaturate(). #85502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Add message details for AmbiguousMatchException #84512
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PublishTrimmed should respect PublishSelfContained #32272
  • GenAPI IncludeVisibleOutsideOfAssembly --include-visible-outside is misnamed #32258
  • dotnet 7.0.4 (iOS): NullReferenceException in Socket-related code (originating from Http2Connection disposal) #32245

Closed

  • I get error NU1202 when I try to build the SDK on my local machine #31856

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix typo in Directory.Build.props #32259
    untriaged

Merged

  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.14.0 to 19.14.1 in /eng/dependabot #32203
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.12.1 to 19.14.1 in /eng/dependabot #32208
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #32224
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #32225
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #32194
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Change where to get latest .gitignore from #31965
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Update dependabot to run on 4xx #31837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32126
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #32193
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Primary Constructors #2691
    Working Set
  • Champion: fixed-sized buffers #1314
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Lock statement pattern #7104
  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Add speclet for `ref readonly` parameters #7165

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CreateDescriptionItems should not load document text on the UI thread #68104
  • the tree-view resets to the top whenever the model is updated, making is so you lose your place in the tree. #68103
  • As you navigate in a file, the selected item in the view will be updated, but will not scroll into view. So finding that item is extremely challenging (in large files). #68102
  • Sort state is not preserved across VS sessions. #68100
  • SearchBar lacks history, as well as normal `x` adornment to clear the search #68098
  • Sort buttons do not show their state, making it unclear what the current sorting state is #68096
  • [LSP] Support URIs as a first class document property #68083

Closed

  • Document outline should do shorter qualification for explicit interface methods #65714
    17.6 P3
  • Document outline should distinguish members with multiple overloads #65713
    17.6 P3
  • IntelliSense/Auto-complete off-by-one on overload count on members of lambda argument objects #61343
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33703.465 #68085

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix detection of nested symbols in Document Outline #68107
    Area-IDE, IDE-Navigation, Navigation-Document Outline
  • Avoid waiting on the thread pool when there is no work to do #68106
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Check if DocCookie is int instead of uint #68105
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Move a few types related to pattern matching to be structs instead of classes. #68101
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add ServiceHub vsix for ARM64 #68099
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Delete unnecessary O# service #68097
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use a proper tool bar in Document Outline #68094
    Area-IDE, IDE-Navigation, untriaged, Navigation-Document Outline
  • Add `AdditionalTextValueProvider<TValue>` #68092
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Enable document outline by default #68088
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Report only warning for `ref` argument at `in` parameter #68087
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • IDE1006: Support multiple underscores #68086
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Feature - IDE1006

Merged

  • Check ISymbolRenamedCodeActionOperationFactoryWorkspaceService is null when rename #68095
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix number of additional overloads on lambda parameter's member recommendations #68028
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Use AsNullable helper method where appropriate #68091
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid task allocations for TextDocument.GetTextAsync #68090
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #68093
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Move potential expensive task of ItemManager to ThreadPool #68082
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Create new vsix for x64 .NET ServiceHub services #65471
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update DiaSym version details #68080
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to release/dev17.7 #68089
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix up implementation for parameterless requests. #68077
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add SelectAsArrayAsync which allows passing state explicitly #68071
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Val/revert66430 17.6 #67849
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Use a weak event handler pattern for GlobalOptionService #68062
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #68084
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Use client languageId when file path is ambiguous #68010
    Area-IDE, LSP, untriaged
  • Break cycles in attribute binding #68067
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Avoid rooting document instances in NavigateToSearchResult #68068
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Razor internals #67644
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Finalize testing and implementation around object initializers for inline arrays. #68064
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Display standalone parameter names by default #67857
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Optimize nullable value type constant comparison codegen #68069
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pool `BindingDiagnosticBag`s #67954
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Remove the ` bool IsUnsafe(this TypeSymbol type)` method #67831
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Convert BindingDiagnosticsBag into a struct #68046
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations observed in local trace opening Roslyn.sln #68076
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Preserve removed entries in `SyntaxNodeProvider` #67636
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.7
  • LSP.Range may request beyond length of file #68081
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #67925
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove non-generic BindingDiagnosticBag #68041
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add FilterTree/FilterSpan API on SymbolStartAnalysisContext and SymbolAnalysisContext #68052
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics
  • Use BatchFixer to fix all for naming violation #59452
    Area-IDE
  • Transform factory #68072
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • High number of SignalR requests compared with rest of application #48080
  • DataProtectionProvider.Create(string applicationName, X509Certificate2 certificate) never works #48079
  • Perf regression: https, mvc #48078
  • Question - Where does Visual Studio store https or IIS Express option for a Blazor project? #48074
  • EntryPointNotFoundException throwns in action #48070
  • can i set logger file encoding when stdoutLogEnabled="true" #48069
  • How to Base64UrlEncode in Blazor WebAssembly client now that Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities has been deprecated? #48068
  • OutputCache - SetVaryByRouteValue doesn't work #48066
  • Memory retained when a blazor component uses Linq Any method in it #48065
  • Memory leak when using RenderFragment in Blazor component #48063
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #48061
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef #48060
  • Update AuthenticationService.js to refresh Blazor WASM user interface when user is logged out via check_session_iframe #48058
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • RDG file name mismatch between SyntaxTree.FilePath and [CallerFilePath] causes runtime KeyNotFoundException #47918
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, mvc #48039
  • Perf regression: mapaction #48062
  • [Blazor web assembly] On page reload for a deployed app, set environment (environment's appsettings file) not being picked #47881
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Authorization FallbackPolicy - requirements not evaluated #48019
  • When using Custom Authentication handler, httpContext.User is not getting updated even after token validation is successful #48053
  • Perf regression: https, single_query #48051
  • [Route Tooling] Versioned Routes #47564
    Discussions
  • Cookie accidentally shared between subdomains of my application? #47998

PullRequests

Created

  • Replace ISystemClock with TimeProvider in Kestrel #48081
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel
  • Code Fix for AfterOnResourceExecution Diagnostic Event. #48077
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix Fetch + Cookies when using Node 18+ #48076
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript
  • http.sys (7.0 backport): new option for response buffering #48073
    area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • http.sys (6.0 backport): new option for response buffering #48072
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • http.sys: short-circuit empty writes (if we've started) #48071
    area-runtime
  • Introduce KestrelServerOptions.HasDefaultOrDevelopmentCertificate #48057
    blocked

Merged

  • Bump dotnet to pickup hosted publish fixes #48075
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Fix generation of SourceKey path in RDG #48017
    area-identity, 8.0-preview5
  • Add infrastructure for trimming and NativeAOT test apps. #48024
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Rename IndexOfAnyValues to SearchValues #48067
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Change incorrect usage of ArgumentNullException #47731
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Extend ControllerBase.Problem that can add extensions to ProblemDetails #47539
    stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Expand support for MapX methods in RDG #48012
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Add initial support for parameters with `AsParameters` attribute #47914
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add IAcceptsMetadata to RDG #47942
    area-runtime
  • Defer search for dev cert until build bind time #48056
    blocked, area-runtime
  • Unified app model routing #47759
    area-blazor
  • Skip AOT template tests on Linux, where they are known to fail. #48022
    area-mvc
  • Avoid closure in IConnectionBuilder.Use #47845
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Skip counter measurement when start listening while processing #48045
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Don't generate RequestBody for parameters when disabledInferredBody is true #47807
    Servicing-consider, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 7.0.x
  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #47748
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • http.sys; add opt-in support for kernel-mode response buffering #47776
    blocked, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, area-perf, pending-ci-rerun
  • [blazor] Set Cross-Origin-Policy headers for multi-threaded runtime #47855
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview4
  • Add analyzer/codefixer to use AddAuthorizationBuilder #47428
    area-security, community-contribution, pr: pending author input

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Border with RoundRectangle Corner Radius values are smaller than they were #14936
    .NET 8
  • ImageButton cannot be smaller than ~30 #14932
  • Shell.TitleView taps are not passed in iOS #14931
    Backlog
  • iOS: Content in `Border` with `StrokeShape` of `Ellipse` not rendered correctly. #14927
    Backlog
  • iOS: Image layout problem - can spill out into surrounding UI #14926
    Backlog
  • Android: Tapping a notification causes second `OnCreate()` call and crash. #14924
    Backlog
  • Binding Context on Content View #14919
    Backlog
  • Android: default Frame BackgroundColor is white, which makes things not visible in dark mode #14916
    Backlog

Closed

  • HE has not shown .net framework app develpoment #14808
  • Android: Swiping app away causes two `OnDestroy()` calls. #14925
  • Unable to access local network when using hot restart. Error: The Internet connection appears to be offline. #14930
  • FontImageSource Glyph using font name #12732
    Backlog
  • Maui App LifeCycle broken on Android #13000
    Backlog
  • Title in flyoutitem not visible #6882
    Backlog
  • CarouselView does not go backwards more than the number of times it went forward! #14759
  • CarouselView does not work on Windows #14760

PullRequests

Created

  • Clarify ISafeAreaView docs #14934
  • [android] reduce interop calls in MauiDrawable #14933
  • feat: adding IWindowCreator #14921
    community ✨
  • [macOS] Implement IsEnabled property in MenuFlyoutItems #14920
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-contextmenu
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • Controls(Android): fix frame background color #14917
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨

Merged

  • Investigations and fixes for the Foo #14910
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update AndroidX #14892

Updated

  • [uitests] Work for get appium uitests with CI #14488
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #14109
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • Handle Grid * expansion when size is larger than minimum, but less than sufficient to display full size #14902
    area/layout 🔲, layout-grid
  • Use default SmallChange value for WinUI slider #14912
    area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, do-not-merge, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView.RemainingItemsThresholdReached #14391
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Windows] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Implement all permutations of InputTransparent and CascadeInputTransparent #14846
  • Try a new Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Maui SDK #14640
  • [Android] Allow to override WebViewClient on Android WebView #14321
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android] Changes updating ImageButton Padding to avoid size issues #14905
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [iOS] Fix Label Truncation on iOS with HorizontalOptions #14453
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LINQ Expression (JsonQueryExpression) could not be translated #30830
  • Configuring multiple containers with distinct partition keys to same DbContext #30829
  • Using FK with HasColumnType causes strange migration changes #30827
  • Specific attribute not getting generated in cosmos db when creating objects #30824

Closed

  • migrationBuilder.Sql Smicolon Error while creating function #30826
  • Where() after Select() sometimes fails to translate #30819
  • Migration File Generation Command Comment #30808
  • ValueConverters not considered with Sequence generators #30749
  • Multiple LeftJoins (GroupJoins) lead to GroupJoin Exception when the same where is used twice #30575
    7.0.7

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Bump SqlClient to 5.0.2 due to bad memory bug in 5.0.1 #30828
    tell-mode
  • Re-introduce quirk with typo #30825
    tell-mode
  • ModelBuilder API for sentinels #30809

Updated

  • SQLite Scaffolding: Use column type and values to provide a better CLR type #30816
  • Translate x.parse #28337
    waiting-for-response
